item.title: Sicko. You need to see this movie.
item.description: The other night i was somehow able to see Michael Moore's new movie: Sicko. It was amazing. Really sad and funny at the same time. It told me what i already knew - but added a bunch of person touches to it as well. One thing it mentioned that I didn't know - was that Cuba is a mecca for good medicine and is involved in bringing medicine to a lot of other third world countries.
